settings.code:
<style>
/*customize collections CSS*/
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product-wrapper{
	background-color: #F8F8F8;
	position: relative;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-inner{
	position: initial!important;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product:not(.t4s-colors-selected):hover .t4s-product-inner:before, .t4s-collection-page .t4s-product.t4s-colors-selected .t4s-product-inner:hover:before{
	opacity: 0!important;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-info{
	position: relative;
	padding: 0 20px 35px 20px;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-info .t4s-product-info__inner .t4s-product-colors{
	position: absolute;
    top: -40px;
    display: flex;
    width: 90%;
    justify-content: center;
    opacity: 0;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-pr-style4:not(.t4s-colors-selected):hover .t4s-product-colors, .t4s-collection-page .t4s-pr-style4.t4s-colors-selected .t4s-product-inner:hover .t4s-product-colors{
	opacity: 1!important;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-inner{
	background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product-img .t4s-product-img img{
	padding: 50px!important;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-title{
	min-height: 40px;
	overflow: hidden;
    display: -webkit-box;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-line-clamp: 2;
}
.t4s-collection-page .loox-rating .loox-icon{
	font-size: 20px;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-price{
	    margin: 10px 0 20px 0!important;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-pr-style4 .t4s-product-btns .t4s-pr-addtocart .t4s-text-pr{
	font-size: 16px;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-btns a{
	height: 52px;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-pr-style4:not(.t4s-colors-selected):hover .t4s-product-rating, .t4s-collection-page .t4s-pr-style4.t4s-colors-selected .t4s-product-inner:hover .t4s-product-rating{
	opacity: 0;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product-badge>.t4s-badge-sale{
	background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)!important;
	background-image: url("https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Group_686_256x256.png")!important;
	background-size: 100% 100%;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-main-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-badge{
	top: -3px;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-main-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-badge .t4s-badge-sale{
	width: 65px;
	height: 35px;
}
#shopify-section-template--14456675434558__heading_template .page-head{
	max-width: 1350px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #E6E6E6;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-container{
	max-width: 1350px!important;
	margin: 0 auto;
}
.t4s-collection-page .t4s-full-width-link{
	z-index: 4!important;
}

@media (max-width:768px) {
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-btns a{
		height: 36px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .loox-rating .loox-icon{
		font-size: 16px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-inner{
		padding: 18px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-info{
		padding: 0 10px 40px 10px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-price{
		margin: 10px 0 15px 0!important;
		font-size: 18px;
		line-height: 23px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-title{
		font-size: 12px;
		line-height: 16px;
		min-height: 32px;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-product .t4s-product-info .t4s-product-info__inner .t4s-product-colors{
		display: none;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-collection-header{
		margin: 25px 0;
	}
	.t4s-collection-page .t4s-collection-header .t4s-layout-switch-wrapper{
		display: none;
	}

}
</style>
